text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Racing—an intense clash of speed<n>versus speed, where
every<n>millisecond counts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One evening, I come upon a student<n>who's silently dashing
accross the<n>turf, totally lost in a world all her own.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"Blissful." No other word can better<n>describe the expression
gracing<n>Silence Suzuka's visage as I observe<n>her for the
first time.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not often you see someone on<n>the track this late on a
day off. She<n>continues to run at a truly staggering<n>speed.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Phew! A quiet course all to myself...<n>Running at night is the
best.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And maybe it's just my imagination,<n>but the stars seem a
little brighter than<n>usual tonight.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I've got this scenery all to<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Is there something I can do for<n>you?
choice_data_list: No. I just noticed how happy you looked.
No. I just noticed how happy you looked.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: O-oh? Is that so?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... Sorry, if you'll excuse me now...<n>I want to run a little
longer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And after just a brief exchange of<n>words, Silence Suzuka
takes off<n>running once more. It seems she is<n>not yet
content with her extra training<n>this night.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't recall ever seeing a runner<n>happier to be out on the
track past<n>dusk. The sight of her cutting through<n>the
evening breeze is truly one to<n>behold.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's only a few days until we're able<n>to meet again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's at today's academy tryouts.<n>All the race-ready
students are there<n>to demonstrate their skill in hopes of<n>
being scouted.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's fast—really fast. There goes<n>Silence Suzuka, leading
by five<n>lengths. Six lengths. She leads by<n>seven lengths!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
H-how does she maintain such<n>speed? Does she really
intend to keep<n>it up till the very end?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
You'd expect her to be thoroughly<n>tired out by now, but she
refuses to let<n>go of that immense lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners have entered the final<n>leg. The distance from
the lead is<n>slowly closing—but Silence Suzuka<n>remains
solidly ahead! Can she keep<n>this up?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I won't give up the lead... toanyone!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka crosses the finish!<n>She wins with ease,
leaving everyone<n>else in the dust!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Neither the plight of her rivals nor the<n>shouts from the crowd
matter to the<n>runner. She needs only to fix her gaze<n>ever
forward to win with such a vast<n>lead.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Of course, I am not the only one to<n>have such a thought.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka! That was truly a marvelous<n>display! I would like to
talk to you<n>about a training contract.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh? Oh, um... Okay.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
You've a fine pair of legs to be sure,<n>but I just know that
you are capable<n>of so much more!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: More than that? Do you mean it?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Yes. You performed wonderfully, but I<n>can tell that you
would be nearly<n>invincible with a bit more practical<n>
knowledge.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
If you'd like, I would be happy to<n>teach you a better way of
running. I<n>dare say that it would give you the<n>lead in any
race you desire to run in.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The lead... in any race?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: All right. I accept your scouting offer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unsurprisingly, she is snatched up<n>before I am able to utter
even a single<n>word.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Some time later...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I enter the library one day to find<n>Silence Suzuka and Air
Groove<n>engaged in a rather<n>technical-sounding
conversation.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You'll be needing anaerobic energy<n>for that instantaneous
burst of speed.<n>And in order to maintain that speed,<n>you
need aerobic energy.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
There's a limit to how much<n>anaerobic energy the body can
afford<n>to expend, so it's of the utmost<n>importance to
decide how to conserve<n>and use it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Then that means, in order to speed up<n>later on, I should
focus on conserving<n>energy at the start of a race by<n>
suppressing my speed... Do I have it<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Right. This is one of the basic<n>foundations of modern racing
theory.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Theory is not something I've ever<n>given much thought to
before... I<n>suppose it's time I learned a bit more<n>about it...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Air Groove. I'm glad you<n>could break it down for
me.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's my pleasure.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
But I am a little surprised. You're<n>known for exploding into
the lead right<n>from the outset of a race and staying<n>there.
This would be quite a change of<n>pace.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, just a little.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'd better start today's runs and<n>practice what you've told
me. I'll see<n>you again later.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yeah...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Theory... That must mean that it's the<n>proper way of doing
things. Okay, if i<n>run the way she taught me...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'll be fine. And surely the scenery<n>will become even more
beautiful...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's an air of doubt in her quiet<n>murmurings. And having
heard them, I<n>cannot help but become a bit<n>concerned for
the renowned front<n>runner.
